unit.name: Tzar
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and heavy armour. Special Rules: Grand General.

unit.name: Tzarina
unit.description: Magic: This model is a Level 4 wizard. It must choose 1-2 PM and 2-4 BM spells. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: none.

unit.name: Rotamaster
unit.description: Mount: Warhorse Equipment: Hand weapon and heavy armour. Special Rules: Stubborn.

unit.name: Battle Standard
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and light armour. Special Rules: none.

unit.name: Boyar
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and light armour. Special Rules: Stubborn.

unit.name: Shaman
unit.description: Magic: This model is a Level 2 wizard. It must choose 0-1 PM and 1-2 BM spells. Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: none.

unit.name: Kossar
unit.description: Equipment: Great weapon and bow. Special Rules: Steady in the Ranks.

unit.name: Axeman
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and shield. Special Rules: Block (Shield).

unit.name: Horse Archer
unit.description: Mount: Warhorse. Equipment: Hand weapon and bow. Special Rules: Light Cavalry.

unit.name: Winged Lancer
unit.description: Mount: Warhorse. Equipment: Hand weapon, lance, heavy armour and shield. Special Rules: Glorious Charge.

unit.name: Peasant
unit.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: Undisciplined.

unit.name: Gryphon Lancer
unit.description: Mount: Warhorse. Equipment: Hand weapon, lance, heavy armour and shield. Special Rules: Glorious Charge.

unit.name: Oblast Outrider
unit.description: Mount: Warhorse. Equipment: Spear, thowing axe and light armour. Special Rules: Light Cavalry.

unit.name: Kreml Guard
unit.description: Equipment: Great weapon and heavy armour. Special Rules: Block (Shield), Stubborn, Immune to Psychology.

unit.name: Streltsi
unit.description: Equipment: Handgun, halberd and light armour. Special Rules: Steady Aim.

unit.name: Bear
unit.description: Equipment: Whip (only Beastmaster) and heavy armour. Special Rules: Bear Pack, Fear (Bears only), Frenzy (Bears only). 1 Beastmaster + 1 Bear per Pack. Min. size = 2 packs.

unit.name: Druzhina
unit.description: Mount: Barded Warhorse. Equipment: Hand weapon, lance, heavy armour and shield. Special Rules: Heavy Cavalry.

unit.name: Bear Rider
unit.description: Mount: Bear. Equipment: Hand weapon, lance, heavy armour and shield. Special Rules: Bad Tempered, Fear, Bear Scent.

unit.name: Wagon Fort
unit.description: Chariot: AS 5+, 5 Defenders. Equipment: Defenders are armed with bows and spears. Special Rules: Wagon Fort, Stubborn.

unit.name: War Wagon
unit.description: Chariot: AS 4+, 6 Defenders, 2 Warhorses. Special Rules: War Wagon, Large Target. Options: each 3 Defenders may be exchanged for a 2 man Canon Crew with a War Wagon Canon. Special Rules: War Wagon, Large Target.

unit.name: Imperial Pikeman
unit.description: Equipment: Pike and heavy armour. Special Rules: Ally (Empire).

unit.name: Imperial Handgunner
unit.description: Equipment: Handguns. Special Rules: Ally (Empire).

unit.name: Imperial Pistolier
unit.description: Mount: Warhorse. Equipment: Brace of pistols and light armour. Special Rules: Ally (Empire), Light Cavalry.

mount.name: Warhorse
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon. Special Rules: none.

mount.name: Great Bear
mount.description: Equipment: Hand weapon and heavy armour. Special Rules: Fear.

item.name: Amulet of Luck
item.description: Ward Save (2+) versus first wound suffered (after armour save).

item.name: Armour of Endurance
item.description: Heavy armour, +1T

item.name: Armour of Tzars
item.description: Heavy Armour. Attacker must pass a Strength test for each attack in cc or the attack fails.

item.name: BM Hunters Spear
item.description: (9+): MM, Range 24", 1 hit like bolt thrower (S6, no AS, D3 wounds, penetrates ranks).

item.name: BM Ice Cage
item.description: (8+): Hex, Range 24". Target unit halves its M (rounding up) including mounts. Flyers have to use their ground movement but do not half their M. Lasts until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: BM Midwinters Kiss
item.description: (10+): Place the tear drop template touching the caster in its front arc and determine hits using the template rules. All models hit suffer a S5 hit. If the caster is in cc, select one enemy unit that is in btb with the caster, this unit suffers D6 S5 hits.

item.name: BM Shardstorm
item.description: (6+): MM, Range 24", 2D6 S3 hits.

item.name: BM Snowstorm
item.description: (8+): Hex, Range 24", target unit suffers -1M, -1WS, -1BS and -1I until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: BM Ursuns Defiance
item.description: (9+): Augment, Range 18", unit gains Regeneration (4+) until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Bad Tempered
item.description: At the end of the declare charges phase, if the unit didnt declare a charge but would be able to (has an enemy unit within charge range and could legally charge), it has to pass a Ld-test or has to charge the nearest possible enemy unit.

item.name: Banner of Frozen Paths
item.description: Bearer and his unit do not suffer movement penalties for difficult terrain.

item.name: Banner of Hearth Fire
item.description: Friendly units within 12" gain MR2. In addition units shooting at friendly units within 12" suffer -1BS (to a minimum of 0) for this attack.

item.name: Bear Claws
item.description: Counts as additional hand weapons. +1A for each enemy model in BTB. Models on foot only.

item.name: Bear Claws Necklace
item.description: Bearer gains Frenzy.

item.name: Bear Pack
item.description: - The unit consists of Bears and Beastmasters. Fill ranks with Bears first then with Beastmasters. If the unit comprises a single Bear, the unit may form a formation with a frontage of less than 60mm. - As long as the unit comprises at least one Beastmaster, the unit may take a Ld test at the start of its turn. If passed, the unit does not have to charge this turn. - Randomise ranged hits between Bears (1-5) and Beastmasters (6). - In cc Beastmasters do not have to step up as long as there are enough Bears left for all remaing Beastmasters to be placed behind (i.e. ratio of 2 Beastmasters : 1 Bear). - Beastmasters are ignored for determining rank bonuses. - If all Bears are slain, the unit is destroyed. If the unit is destroyed in close combat, Beastmasters destroyed in this way do not count towards combat resolution. - Characters cannot join this unit.

item.name: Bear Scent
item.description: This unit can only be joined by characters mounted on a Great Bear or characters on foot.

item.name: Beast Bane
item.description: Versus opponents with T5+ the bearer gets +1S and causes D3 wounds

item.name: Buckler of Coldness
item.description: Shield. Enemies attacking the bearer in close combat suffer -1 to their to-hit rolls.

item.name: Crimson Bow
item.description: Range 24", S5, Multiple Shots (2)

item.name: Crystal Cloak
item.description: Ward Save (4+)

item.name: Daemon-Killer Aura
Daemon-Kill. Aura
item.description: Model causes Terror.

item.name: Dispel Scroll
item.description: Automatically dispels one spell without the need of DD. One use only.

item.name: Dreamcatcher
item.description: Immune to effects of first miscast (BM or PM)

item.name: Enchanted Shield
item.description: Shield that grants +2 AS.

item.name: Frost Axe
item.description: no AS

item.name: Frost Bear Testicle
item.description: At the start of any turn of any player the model can consume the Frost Bear Testicle to gain S6, T6 and a breath weapon with S3 until the end of that turn. One use only.

item.name: Frost Reaper
item.description: Great weapon. Enemies attacking the bearer in close combat suffer -1 to their to-hit rolls. Models on foot only.

item.name: Glorious Charge
item.description: When this unit declares a charge, it causes Fear until the end of (its own) turn.

item.name: Goretooth Banner
item.description: The unit gains AP(1) in cc as well as for shooting. Has no effect on magic items and black powder weapons (handguns/pistols of any kind).

item.name: Grand General
item.description: If this model is the general of the army, its range for Inspiring Presence is 18".

item.name: Great weapons (in exchance of lances)
item.description: +2S, Always strikes last, exchange their lances for great weapons.

item.name: Guard Stone
item.description: MR2

item.name: Helmet of the Tzar
item.description: Reroll failed armour saves.

item.name: Hochland Long Rifle
Hochland Long Rifle (Champ)
item.description: Range 36", S4, AP(1), Sniper, move or fire

item.name: Horn of Erengrad
item.description: PM3/5+. All friendly broken units rally immediately, even if below 25%.

item.name: Horse Lords
item.description: Each rider mounted on a Warhorse rerolls to-hit rolls of natural 1s in cc.

item.name: Ice Crystal Amulet
item.description: Enemies in btb suffer from ASL. Models on foot only.

item.name: Khans Pride
item.description: Lance, reroll failed to-wound rolls

item.name: Magic Pendant
item.description: Ward Save (5+), MR2

item.name: Mastercrafted Armour
item.description: 2+ AS which cannot be improved. The model does not count as heavy cav. Mounted models only.

item.name: Midwinter
item.description: KB

item.name: Oblast Banner
item.description: If this unit has the Light Cavalry special rule it may start the game in reserve. Beginning with turn 2, roll a d6 at the start of your turn: on a 4+ the unit may enter the battlefield from any board edge (as if it has left the board in a previous turn due to a pursuit), add +1 to the roll for each turn after the second, a natural 1 always fails.

item.name: PM Frost Shield
Frost Shield PM3/6+
Frost Shield PM 2/6+
item.description: (6+): Augment, Range 18", 5+ Ward Save vs ranged attacks and spells until the casters next magic phase. Has no effect on character models .

item.name: PM Ursuns Fury
Ursuns Fury PM3/5+
Ursuns Fury PM 2/5+
item.description: (5+): Augment, Range 18", unit rerolls to-wound rolls of natural 1s until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: PM Valour of Ursun
Valour of Ursun PM3/5+
Valour of Ursun PM 2/5+
item.description: (5+): Augment, Range 18", target unit becomes Immune to Fear, Terror and Panic until the casters next magic phase.

item.name: Pelt of the Great Bear
item.description: +1AS

item.name: Power Stone
item.description: +2PD to cast a spell. Dice used may exceed maximum allowed by level. One use only.

item.name: Repeater Handgun
Repeater Handgun (Champ)
item.description: Range 24", S4, AP(1), move or fire, Multiple Shots (3)

item.name: Repeater Pistol
Repeater Pistol (Champ)
item.description: Range 8", S4, AP(1), Multiple Shots (3), no penalty for moving and shooting as well as long range; may always Stand & Shoot, even if the enemy is within half charge distance.

item.name: Romanoff Vodka
item.description: Roll a D6 after deployment. Bearer and unit he is with gain: 1 Stupidity, 2-4 Immunity to Psychology, 5-6 Frenzy. Has no effect on mounts or other characters in the unit. After deployment bearer cannot leave or join units. One use only.

item.name: Sceptre of Eternal Winter
Sceptre o. E. Winter
item.description: Bearer may use one more PD to cast spells than his level allows (BM only).

item.name: Shadowhide Cloak
item.description: Regeneration (5+)

item.name: Shaman Rod
item.description: PM 3/3+, Clairvoyance: Target one unit on the board. Your opponent has to reveal any hidden models and magic items (but not which model has them) in that unit.

item.name: Shields (lose Great weapons)
item.description: +1AS but exchange their great weapons for shields

item.name: Shields (loses the Light Cavalry)
item.description: +1AS but loses Light Cavalry rule

item.name: Staff of Sorcery
item.description: +1 to total roll to attempt to dispel a spell.

item.name: Standard of Determination
item.description: The unit is allowed to march even when an enemy unit is within march blocking range (usually within 8").

item.name: Standard of Glory
item.description: Unit rerolls failed panic tests.

item.name: Steady Aim
item.description: If this unit is equipped with both a handgun and a halberd, it does not suffer the -1 to-hit penalty for shooting at long range.

item.name: Steady in the Ranks
item.description: The unit may always Stand & Shoot, even if any charging unit is within half charge distance of this unit. If the unit is more than half charge distance away from all units charging it, it also does not suffer the -1 to-hit penalty for Stand & Shoot.

item.name: Steppe Lance
item.description: Lance, no AS

item.name: Steppe Storm Standard
item.description: Ward Save (5+) vs shooting and magic missile attacks.

item.name: Tailwind Banner
item.description: Unit gains +1M.

item.name: Talisman of Winter
item.description: Ward Save (5+)

item.name: Totem of Crows
item.description: PM 2/7+, MM, Range 18", D6 S3 hits

item.name: Tribe Regalia
item.description: Can be used at the start of any own turn. The bearer and his unit roll an additional dice for all Ld-based tests and discard the lowest. The lasts until the start of the next own turn. One use only.

item.name: Trophy of the Chaoswaste
item.description: Bearer and unit are immune to Fear and Terror.

item.name: Undisciplined
item.description: Characters cannot join this unit.

item.name: Ursa Banner
item.description: The unit gains Frenzy.

item.name: Wagon Fort
item.description: - Models - The Wagon Fort consists of 4 Wagon Fort Wagons. - Each Wagon Fort Wagon forms an individual unit and is worth 50VP if destroyed. - Deployment- The Wagon Fort has to be deployed completely within the deployment zone of the Kislev player before any army is deployed. The distance between two Wagon Fort Wagons has to be less than 3" and one Wagon Fort Wagon has to contact a table edge. - Movement - Wagon Fort Wagons are stationary, i.e. they cannot move by themselve or declare a charge. - Shooting - Wagon Fort Wagons have an AOS of 360 degree. - Close Combat - Wagon Fort Wagons count as defending an obstacle. - Enemies fighting a Wagon Fort Wagons in cc do not gain bonuses for fighting in its flank or rear. - If a Wagon Fort Wagon fails its break test, it is destroyed. - Enemy units fighting solely against Wagon Fort Wagons cannot pursue (or overrun). - Psychology - If a Wagon Fort Wagon fails a panic test, it does not flee, but instead is not allowed to fire the next turn.

item.name: War Banner
item.description: +1CR

item.name: War Wagon
item.description: - Movement - War Wagons cannot declare charges (or charge). - Shooting - Defenders may fire their handguns even when the War Wagon moved (but suffer the -1 to-hit penalty for moving and shooting). - War Wagons have an AOS of 360 degree. - Each War Wagon Canon may always shoot at a different target than other parts of the War Wagon. - Close Combat - War Wagons count as defending an obstacle for cavalry and monstrous cavalry. - Rank bonuses of enemy units fighting solely against War Wagons are ignored for combat result. - Enemies fighting a War Wagon in cc do not gain bonuses for fighting in its flank or rear. - If a War Wagon fails its break test, it is destroyed. - Enemy units fighting solely against War Wagons cannot pursue (or overrun). - War Wagons pursue 1D6" and always have to stop 1" in front of units they would contact during the pursuit. - Psychology - If a War Wagon fails a panic test, it does not flee, but instead is not allowed to fire the next turn.

item.name: War Wagon Canon
1x War Wagon Canon
2x War Wagon Canons
item.description: Range 36", S5, no AS, D3 wounds, penetrates ranks, no Stand & Shoot.

item.name: Warp Drain
item.description: +1 DD

item.name: Whip
item.description: In cc the bearer may make 1 attack through 1 rank of Bears.
